search.query: index=* host=$host$ tag=oshost tag=performance tag=storage (storage_free_percent=* OR storage=* storage_used=* OR mount=*) | stats latest(storage) as MegabytesTotal, latest(storage_used) as MegabytesUsed, latest(storage_used_percent) as PercentUsed by mount | sort - PercentUsed limit=1 | eval "Free (GB) - {mount}" = (MegabytesTotal - MegabytesUsed) / 1024 | eval "Used (GB) - {mount}" = MegabytesUsed / 1024 | table * | fields - MegabytesUsed, PercentUsed, MegabytesTotal, mount | transpose | rename column as "Statistic", "row 1" as "Space"
